column4: (x-msg)  Hrm, why won't any linux distros or drivers detect my wired ethernet connection?  Does anyone else use *nix on an H55?
I can't find any reference of problems with the network, so I'd expect it to work out of the box
That being said, isn't the network normally done by a different chipset then the northbridge/southbridge, and aren't you more likely to have a Realtek or similar controller?
